sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'行员类别输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.hylb)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'定编人数输入错误，只能输入:21位整数,0位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.dbrs)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.dbrs,21,0)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'定编人数输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.dbrs)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMM!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMM')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'机构代号输入错误，不能为空!' where f_java_rule_length(t.jgdh)=0 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'机构代号不存在!' where not exists(select 1 from khdx_jg j where rtrim(t.jgdh)=rtrim(j.jgdh)) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set error=error||'类别名称必须存在于参数表-行员类别表中' where not exists ( select 1 from csb_hylb lb where t.hylb = lb.lbmc ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.tjrq=(select sjw.ym from csb_sjw sjw where sjw.tjrq=cast(t.tjrq||'01' as integer)) where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)'||(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS')||'！' where cast(t.tjrq as integer)<(select f_change_days(cast(rq.csz as integer ),-cast(cs.csz as integer )) from xtb_xtcs rq,xtb_xtcs cs where rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' and cs.csmc='SYS_CSTS') and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists(select 1 from SGLR_JGDBRS tar ,CSB_SJW CSB_SJW0,KHDX_JG KHDX_JG1,CSB_HYLB CSB_HYLB2 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=CSB_SJW0.TJRQ and CSB_SJW0.YM=tar.TJRQ and t.jgdh=KHDX_JG1.JGDH and KHDX_JG1.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.hylb=CSB_HYLB2.LBMC and CSB_HYLB2.LBDH=tar.HYLB and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ))

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update jgdbrsdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select tjrq,jgdh,hylb from jgdbrsdr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by tjrq,jgdh,hylb having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq and t.jgdh=dr.jgdh and t.hylb=dr.hylb) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE jgdbrsdr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , jgdh varchar(100) , jgmc varchar(100) , hylb varchar(100) , dbrs varchar(100) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgdbrsdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from jgdbrsdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,jgdh,jgmc,hylb,dbrs,khdxdh,error from jgdbrsdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,jgdh,jgmc,hylb,dbrs,khdxdh,error from jgdbrsdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,jgdh,jgmc,hylb,dbrs,khdxdh,error from jgdbrsdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into SGLR_JGDBRS(TJRQ,KHDXDH,HYLB,DBRS,CZR,CZSJ) select CSB_SJW0.YM,KHDX_JG1.KHDXDH,CSB_HYLB2.LBDH,cast (t.dbrs as DECIMAL(25,4)),'$login_khdxdh$',F_GET_SYSTIME() from jgdbrsdr_temp t ,CSB_SJW CSB_SJW0,KHDX_JG KHDX_JG1,CSB_HYLB CSB_HYLB2 where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and CSB_SJW0.TJRQ=cast (t.tjrq as INTEGER) and KHDX_JG1.JGDH=cast (t.jgdh as VARCHAR(15)) and CSB_HYLB2.LBMC=cast (t.hylb as VARCHAR(50))
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete from SGLR_JGDBRS tar where exists(select 1 from jgdbrsdr_temp t ,CSB_SJW CSB_SJW0,KHDX_JG KHDX_JG1,CSB_HYLB CSB_HYLB2 where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=CSB_SJW0.TJRQ and CSB_SJW0.YM=tar.TJRQ and t.jgdh=KHDX_JG1.JGDH and KHDX_JG1.KHDXDH=tar.KHDXDH and t.hylb=CSB_HYLB2.LBMC and CSB_HYLB2.LBDH=tar.HYLB and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ tjrq,jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,lb.lbmc hylb,cast(coalesce(dbrs.dbrs,0) as integer) dbrs from khdx_jg jg inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq=cast($tjrq$01 as integer) inner join csb_hylb lb on 1=1 left join sglr_jgdbrs dbrs on dbrs.khdxdh=jg.khdxdh and dbrs.hylb=lb.lbdh and dbrs.tjrq=sjw.ym where 1=1 and jg.khdxdh=$jgkhdxdh$ and exists( select 1 from khdx_jgcy jgcy inner join khdx_hylb hylb on jgcy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh where sjw.ym between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq and sjw.ym between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq and jgcy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh and hylb.lbdh=lb.lbdh ) order by jg.jgdh,lb.lbmc
